trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration section for scripting settings.
trans-unit.target: Representa a seção de configuração para configurações de script.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingSectionGroup> class to programmatically set and retrieve the values of the `scripting` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingSectionGroup> classe para definir e recuperar valores de programaticamente o `scripting` seção do arquivo de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingSectionGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingSectionGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection" /> object that is derived from the current system configuration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection" /> derivado da configuração de sistema atual.

trans-unit.source: Use the `ScriptingScriptResourceHandler` configuration section to set whether script files that are embedded as resources are compressed and cached.
trans-unit.target: Use o `ScriptingScriptResourceHandler` seção de configuração para definir se os arquivos de script que são inseridos como recursos são compactados e armazenados em cache.

trans-unit.source: You can enable or disable compression and caching by using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCompression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCaching%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode habilitar ou desabilitar a compactação e armazenamento em cache usando o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCompression%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCaching%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingWebServicesSectionGroup" /> object that is derived from the current system configuration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingWebServicesSectionGroup" /> derivado da configuração de sistema atual.
